example.eg: Proceeds from the fundraiser will benefit the population at large.
example.egtrans: 筹款所得将造福所有人。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 大体上, 总体上, 整个

example.eg: The murderer is still at large.
example.egtrans: 那个杀人犯仍然逍遥法外。

example.eg: Besides the chair and treasurer, the board also includes five members at large.
example.egtrans: 除了主席和财务主管外，董事会还有五名普通成员。
